Name: Cube Attack
About the game: Simple game where a small blue cube in his world needs to escape and find a way out. Unfortunately, it wouldn't be easy. A lot of hostile cubes of other (a bit aggressive) colors want to reach him and break our cube apart. Each time levels are getting more complicated: more enemies, more mechanics and only one exit. In this game you will control a blue cube. You need to reach an exit while dodging an impact with hostile cubes which will always try to catch you. Your goal in this game is to enjoy music and don't get angry. All levels are possible to complete. There is always a right way and it's way simpler than you could think.
